text:
If you run junit report with some barrier to xalan loading, all you get is:
 
BUILD FAILED

D:\Projects\..\build.xml:184: Errors while applying transformations

It's only when you go to verbose that you get something like 
"Could not find xalan2 nor xalan1 in the classpath"

At the very least, the main message should be "rerun with -verbose for more
info"; maybe the error message should be bumped up the stack
creator: stevel@apache.org
